item.title: AI Workflows - Visuals
item.description: It’s 2026 and I’ve been trying to decide what AI and LLMs are useful for in my day to day teaching. One of the things that has been floating around has been the promise of reducing admin time for teachers using LLMs, but I honestly haven’t found the argument to be that compelling. I don’t trust it near the things that take up most of my admin time like communicating with students, parents, and partner schools. It’s mostly been terrible for curriculum planning, mediocre at best for assessment design, and laughably bad at generating lesson slides, particularly anything involving diagrams.
